SELECT CASE WHEN
LENGTH(SERIAL_SEQ.NEXTVAL)>3 THEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')||'-'||LPAD(SERIAL_SEQ.CURRVAL,2,0) ELSE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')||'-'||SERIAL_SEQ.CURRVAL END FROM DUAL
LENGTH(DE_SEQ.NEXTVAL)>3 THEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')||'-'||LPAD(DE_SEQ.CURRVAL,2,0) ELSE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')||'-'||DE_SEQ.CURRVAL END FROM DUAL
LENGTH(CONT_SEQ.NEXTVAL)>3 THEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')||'-'||LPAD(CONT_SEQ.CURRVAL,2,0) ELSE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')||'-'||CONT_SEQ.CURRVAL END FROM DUAL
LENGTH(CO_SEQ.NEXTVAL)>3 THEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')||'-'||LPAD(CO_SEQ.CURRVAL,2,0) ELSE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')||'-'||CO_SEQ.CURRVAL END FROM DUAL
